entry.title: $2300 // Newly renovated large 2br @â—‹ with large private balcony
entry.content:
TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-88 and mention this ad, referring to specific details (price, number of bedrooms & street or neighborhood). I also have plenty of other listings in the same area, just ask!

2 Bed / 1 Bath in Crown Heights, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Crown Hts - Utica Av (2, 3, 4, 5). Newly renovated large 2br with large private balcony - Large open kitchen living combo - Stainless appliances with dishwasher and granite island kitchen countertop - Large windows with huge amount of natural light throughout - Two queen sized bedrooms each with window and closet - One room has access to large balcony - Building has laundry. Apt just 1 block away from express 4 and 5 Station, also 2 and 3 train. .

AMENITIES
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Natural Light in Living Area
Laundry in building
Outdoor Space
Balcony
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Granite countertops

entry.title: $2450 // Franklin Av (FS). Located~=~ on a beautiful brownstone block
entry.content:
TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-88 and mention this ad, referring to specific details (price, number of bedrooms & street or neighborhood). I also have plenty of other listings in the same area, just ask!

1.5 Bed / 1.5 Bath in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Clinton - Washington Avs (A, C), Clinton - Washington Avs (G), Franklin Av (FS). Located on a beautiful brownstone block, this 1.5 bed is packed with amenities that include a kitchen island, bay window, video intercom, dishwasher, central A/C, hardwood floors, bike storage, extra storage lockers, a microwave, a walk in closet and, best of all, a washer & dryer in the unit. The apt is also right by all the best of Clinton Hill, like Hot Bird, Emily, Sisters, Chuko, Milk River, Ode to Babel & so much more! *net effective price advertised .

AMENITIES
Bike storage
Dishwasher
Stainless Steel Appliances
Eat In Kitchen
Stone countertops
Washer dryer installed
Natural Light in Living Area
Hardwood Floors
High Ceilings
Video Intercom
Storage Space
